DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct feasibility study use randomize control trial ( RCT ) design participant receive Partners Care ( PIC ) diabetes self-management intervention randomize either semi-structured social support standard follow-up control group . Participants support group receive culturally-tailored , semi-structured social support program deliver community set train community peer educator health professional ( e.g. , pharmacist ) . The investigator believe addition semi-structured social support component supplement evidence-based diabetes self-management intervention improve diabetes self-care maintenance .
DOC.brief_title: Partners Care With Semi-Structured Support Group
DOC.criteria: Selfreported Native Hawaiian , Filipino , Pacific Islander ethnic background Adults age > 18 year age Englishspeaking Physiciandiagnosed type 2 diabetes Baseline hemoglobin A1c > 8 % Survival le 6 month Planning move community intervention study period Pregnancy Any comorbid condition ( physical mental disability ) would prevent individual participate intervention protocol ( i.e. , major psychiatric illness )
